gate.alignment

Class Alignment

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.alignment.Alignment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Alignment
extends Object
implements Serializable
    This class stores all the alignment information about a document. It provides various methods to know which annotation is aligned with which annotations and what is the source document of each annotation.
    Author:
    niraj
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • counter

        public static int counter

      • alignmentMatrix

        protected Map<gate.Annotation,Set<gate.Annotation>> alignmentMatrix
        a map that stores information about annotation alignment. As a key, a source annotation and as value, a set of aligned annotations to the source annotation are stored.

      • annotation2Document

        protected Map<gate.Annotation,String> annotation2Document
        For each annotation we store the information about its annotation set. This is used for letting the user know which annotation set the given annotation belongs to.

      • annotation2AS

        protected Map<gate.Annotation,String> annotation2AS
        which annotation belongs to what annotation set

      • listeners

        protected transient List<AlignmentListener> listeners
        all the alignment listeners that wish to listen to vairous alignment events

      • compoundDocument

        protected transient CompoundDocument compoundDocument
        the document this alignment object belongs to.

      • ALIGNMENT_METHOD_FEATURE_NAME

        public static final String ALIGNMENT_METHOD_FEATURE_NAME
        A feature that PRs can use to specify which method was used to align that particular annotation.
